heading: Indians. Gambling.
general-note: Here are entered general works on gambling by Indian participants. Works on gambling by specific groups of Indians or by members of specific tribes are entered under the heading for the group or tribe with the subdivision. Gambling,. e.g.. Indians of North American--Gambling.. Works on gambling taking place on Indian reservations without regard to the ethnicity of the participants, including works on reservation gambling enterprises owned by Indian tribes, are entered under. Gambling on Indian reservations..
